remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是透明的並可從部分信任程式碼呼叫。This method is transparent, and can be called from partially trusted code. 如果之前在發出任何 MSIL 指令，存取屬性，它會傳回 0 （零）。If the property is accessed before any MSIL instructions have been emitted, it returns 0 (zero). 動態語言產生 MSIL 時，此屬性可用來將 MSIL 資料流中的位移對應至來源的程式碼行號。When MSIL is generated for dynamic languages, this property can be used to map offsets in the MSIL stream to source code line numbers. 產生的資訊可用來擲回例外狀況時提供堆疊追蹤。The resulting information can be used to provide stack traces when exceptions are thrown.
